text: hello this is chef john from food wishes

there's nothing worse than an angry math

it was rock-hard and I'm going to
scatter that on top of that first cup of

with a second cup of flour that's right
I like to sandwich my frozen butter and
I'm not sure if that's absolutely
necessary but you know what I'm not
taking any chances
ok we're also going to need some sugar
so I'm going to put in a spoon of sugar
and of course some salt we're going to

and what we're trying to do is we're

into nice small pieces so lots of short

again only this time we're going to let

actually is in real time so let it run
for a few seconds
turn it off let it run for another few
seconds
turn it off and what's going to happen
from the sideview it's going to turn
from this sort of white flowery mixture

crumbs squeeze dough all right but

like around the blades and around the

one last quick pulse and that butter
crust pastry dough is pretty much
together and I know you're still highly
skeptical but that's fine at that point
I want you to dump it on some kind of

simply going to squeeze this together
and you're going to be shocked that

you've ever had the pleasure to feel all
right it's going to be tacking out for

definitely helps it's cold but that will
